headline.main: WPB GROUP WEIGHS AIRCRAFT PROBLEM; Management-Labor Council at First Session Studies All Phases of Production

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 2 -- Donald M. Nelson, chairman of the Board, said today that at the first meeting of the Management-Labor Council problems related to increasing aircraft production were discussed.
abstract: Nelson repts no discussion of assigning labor spokesmen to WPB branches
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 2 -- Donald M. Nelson, chairman of the Board, said today that at the first meeting of the Management-Labor Council problems related to increasing aircraft production were discussed....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
